description:
考研英语中写作是必考的内容，写作所占的比分：英语一占30分，英语二占25分，所占比例很高。写作一定要做好，不仅要有足够的基础知识，还要有一定的写作技巧。而正确的使用英语谚语可以提高分值，现在介绍一些考研英语常用谚语：

1. Actions speak louder than words.

事实胜于雄辩

2. A good beginning is half done.

良好的开端是成功的一半。

3. A good book is a good friend.

好书如挚友。

4. All rivers run into sea.

海纳百川。

5. A stitch in time saves nine.

小洞不补，大洞吃苦。

6. Let bygones be bygones.

过去的就让它过去吧。

7. Don't put off till tomorrow what should be done today.

今日事今日毕。

8. Easier said than done.

说得容易，做得难。

9. A bad workman always blames his tools.

无能的工人常抱怨自己的工具。

10. A body without knowledge is like a house without a foundation.

人无知犹如房屋无基。

11. .Knowledge is power.

知识就是力量。

12. A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.

一知半解，害已误人。

13. A man is never too old to learn.

活到老，学到老。

14. All that glitters is not gold.

闪闪发光的并不一定都是金子。

15. An apple a day keeps the doctor away.

一天一个苹果，医生不来找我。

16. As a man sows, so shall he reap.

种瓜得瓜，种豆得豆。

17. Better late than never.

迟到总比不到强。

18. Blood is thicker than water.

血浓于水。

19. .By learning you will teach, by teaching you will learn.

教学相长。

20. Every man has his weak side.

人人都有弱点。

21. Kill two birds with one stone.

一箭双雕，一石二鸟。

22. .First come, first served.

先来后到。

23. Keep good men company and you shall be of the number.

近朱者赤近墨者黑。

24. Great minds think alike.

英雄所见略同。

25. Knowledge makes humble, ignorance makes proud.

博学使人谦逊，无知使人骄傲。

26. He laughs best who laughs last.

谁笑到最后，谁笑得最好。

27. Where there is a will, there is a way.

有志者事竟成.

28.While there is life, there is hope.

有生命就有希望/留得青山在，不怕没柴烧。

29. Knowing something of everything and everything of something.

通百艺而专一长。

30. Misfortunes tell us what fortune is.

不经灾祸不知福。

31. One today is worth two tomorrows.

一个今天胜似两个明天。

32. Genius only means hard-working all one's life.

天才只意味着终身不懈地努力。

33. All things are difficult before they are easy.

万事开头难。 

34. Constant dripping wears away the stone.

锲而不舍，金石可镂。

35. The good seaman is known in bad weather.

惊涛骇浪，方显英雄本色 

36. Man struggles upwards; water flows downwards.

人往高处走，水往低处流。

37. A house without books is like a room without windows.

一个没有书的房子，犹如一个没有窗户的房间。

38. Speech is silver, silence is golden.

雄辩是银，沉默是金。

39. Health is better than wealth.

健康胜过财富。

40. Seeing is believing.

眼见为实。

41. Prevention is better than cure.

预防胜于治疗。

42. Penny wise, pound foolish.

贪小便宜吃大亏。

43. Out of sight, out of mind.

眼不见心不烦。

44. All rivers run into the sea.

殊途同归。

45. All time is no time when it is past.

机不可失，时不再来。

46. Everybody's business in nobody's business.

三个和尚没水喝。

47. No one can call back yesterday.

昨日不会重现。

48. No pains, no gains.

一分耕耘一分收获/没有付出就没有收获。

49. No way is impossible to courage.

勇士面前无险路。 

50. Never say die.

永不言败。

  • 你是这些美剧的死忠粉？这些配套英文书必看哦

title: 考研英语：常用谚语（1）
